Fixed #73 from PR #75 - AndroidX migration
Preparing v2.1.0 release

Merge pull request #75 from RomanSytnyk/master

Migrating to AndroidX, Gradle & Libs update

Merge pull request #67 from xajik/master

Intercept close event

Merge pull request #66 from TurboProgramming/patch-1

Replacement of "compile" with "implementation"

Replacement of "compile" with "implementation"

As "compile" is going to be deprecated end-2018, this PR replaces with "implementation" that is the new usage.

Merge pull request #59 from AdityaAnand1/patch-1

Update 'compile' to 'implementation'

Cleaned up changes that resolve #45 & resolve #42
Added documentation
Updated README for proper formatting of new features

Merge pull request #51 from GGLabCenter/master

New: added Fragment support and bug fix.

Added Fragment support: Slidr.replace() function

New Sldir.replace() function.

Modded method inside the ViewDragHelper class

method name: checkTouchSlop(View child, float dx, float dy)

Bumped/Deployed Snapshot 2.0.6
Updated .gitignore
removed unnecessary tracked files

Modernizing project and updating all dependencies
Code cleanup and Style cleanup
Added ScrimRender to help improve gpu performance, #34
Looking into ways to improve #42
Removed jacoco as unnecessary and to prevent issues like #44

Merge pull request #32 from DevFactory/release-UTS-330

Add unit tests for library

Merge pull request #1 from DevFactory/devs/mfarid/UTS-330

Add unit tests for library

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/davideas/Slidr into davideas-master
Cherry picked changes from pull request and revised changes to meet my spec

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/davideas/Slidr into davideas-master
Resolving conflicts from merge

Added setters to the slidr config to dynamically change it's values at runtime when needed

Update example project to demonstrate changing colors dynamically
Pushing 2.0.5-SNAPSHOT

Merge pull request #25 from waffle-iron/master

waffle.io Badge

Experimental fix for locking not working
Experimental feature for edge-only grabbing

Updated Gradle plugin and Support library
Updated Readme to include instructions for SNAPSHOT release

Changed the cancel call in the lock/unlock methods of the SliderPanel class to abort in effort to be more friendly about consuming touch events

See issue #24
Playing with experimental Method to replace a given view group with the sliding panel layout to arbitrarily add that gesture functionality to it
Preparing for the next development iteration

all slider callback configurations are now updated with the new configuration parameters (velocity and distance thresholds)
Updated example to be up-to-date with the support libs

Upgrades!
Added some new configuration to Slidr including distance and velocity thresholds for the gesture
Working on changes to allow top and bottom slide action.
Updated build tools, targetSdk, and dependencies to their latest
Added ViewDragHelper state changes to the new Slidr Listener
Integrating a listener in the config to get callbacks

Update README.md

Updated readme to include Maven central badge near the gradle import line for clarity to developers looking to use my library

Finished Drag positions from all directions (LEFT, RIGHT, TOP, BOTTOM)
Still need to implement/fix edge only capturing

Added the ability to swipe the Slidr from the right
Refactoring

Begun ground work on letting the developer submit a Configuration on how the sliding mechanism works, such as it's touch size, slide start position (left, right, top, bottom), the status bar colors, and other small tweaks.

reference to #1
Pushed version 2.0.1 to the server that fixes an issue with the Status Bar color interpolation.

Refactored Project to "Slidr" to be more 'hip' as "SlidableActivity" sucked.

Added functionality to modulate the status bar colors based on the slide progress

Added data and example project

Refactored Project to "Slidr" to be more 'hip' as "SlidableActivity" sucked.

Added functionality to modulate the status bar colors based on the slide progress
Created Example module for the Example application for this lib

Version 1.0.1

 • Full House Cleaning
 • Stripped Manifest to bare minimum so you don't have to use 'tools:replace="android:label,android:theme"'
 • Removed Abstract Activities in favor of 'SlidableAttacher.attach(...)' that now returns a locking interface (the whole reason for the abstract activities)

Added an experimental Static Attacher class that can universally apply the slidable mechanism to any passed Activity.
 • This still needs testing.
